text: @senatemajldr CORONAVIRUS is FAKE virus. Maybe made up by Hillary and SOROS to hurt DONALD TRUMP in the upcoming election.  Could it be considered voter fraud?  we need to put a stop to this assault on our great democracy!  🇺🇸 #Republicans2020
